title: Gauged String Actions and O($\tilde{d}$, $\tilde{d}$) Transformation
abstract: An O($\tilde{d}$, $\tilde{d}$) transformation is given which relates ungauged string actions to the gauged ones for a large class of models discussed recently by Giveon and Rocek. Interestingly, the transformation is background independent and has a unique matrix representation in a given space-time dimension.
